Vengeance

Peter Peterson, a disturbed man with an ugly childhood. Living with parents as drug dealers can't always be easy. Violence drama and murder, oh my! The book vengeance has it all. This book will have you at the edge of your seat, making you want to turn the page. All proceeds from the sale of this book will go to Kira's fund: https://solvingkidscancer.org.uk/campaigns/Kira/
